channel.title: Populus Tomentosa on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Populus Tomentosa on funPlantGenes

item.title: PtGT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtGT1 Gene Name: putative glycosyltransferase1 Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: Over-expression of a putative poplar glycosyltransferase gene, PtGT1, in tobacco increases lignin content and causes early flowering.

item.title: PtoCDKB
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtoCDKB Gene Name: cyclin-dependent kinase B Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: Induction of PtoCDKB and PtoCYCB transcription by temperature during cambium reactivation in Populus tomentosa Carr.

item.title: PtoCesA3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtoCesA3 Gene Name: cellulose synthase3 Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: Single nucleotide polymorphisms in a cellulose synthase gene (PtoCesA3) are associated with growth and wood properties in Populus tomentosa.

item.title: PtoCYCB
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtoCYCB Gene Name: cyclin B Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: Induction of PtoCDKB and PtoCYCB transcription by temperature during cambium reactivation in Populus tomentosa Carr.

item.title: PtoERF15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.008G166100 Gene Symbol: PtoERF15 Gene Name: ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR 15 Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: The AP2/ERF transcription factor PtoERF15 confers drought tolerance via JA-mediated signaling in Populus.

item.title: PtoFT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.010G179700 Gene Symbol: PtoFT2 Gene Name: FLOWERING LOCUS T2 Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: ELONGATED HYPOCOTYL 5a (PtoHY5a) modulates FLOWERING LOCUS T2 (PtoHY5a) and gibberellin levels to control dormancy and bud break in poplar.

item.title: PtoHY5a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.018G029500 Gene Symbol: PtoHY5a Gene Name: ELONGATED HYPOCOTYL 5a Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: ELONGATED HYPOCOTYL 5a (PtoHY5a) modulates FLOWERING LOCUS T2 (PtoHY5a) and gibberellin levels to control dormancy and bud break in poplar.

item.title: PtomtAPX
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtomtAPX Gene Name: mitochondrial ascorbate peroxidase Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: PtomtAPX, a mitochondrial ascorbate peroxidase, plays an important role in maintaining the redox balance of Populus tomentosa Carr.

item.title: PtoMYB142
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtoMYB142 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor PtoMYB142 enhances drought tolerance in Populus tomentosa by regulating gibberellin catabolism.

item.title: PtoMYC2b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.003G092200 Gene Symbol: PtoMYC2b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: Here, we identified and characterized an osmotic stress-induced ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR 15 (PtoERF15) and its target, PtoMYC2b, which was involved in mediating vessel size, density, and cell wall thickness in response to drought in Populus tomentosa.

item.title: PtoP4H9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ptom.001G.02866 Gene Symbol: PtoP4H9 Gene Name: Genome: P.

item.title: PtoRD26.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: P.x_tomentosa47952 Gene Symbol: PtoRD26.1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Description: Conclusion Our findings reveal a novel ABA-dependent salt-responsive mechanism, which is mediated by the PtoNF-YC9-SRMT-PtoRD26 module that confers salt tolerance to this triploid poplar.

item.title: PtotAPX
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtotAPX Gene Name: thylakoid APX Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: Chloroplast thylakoid ascorbate peroxidase PtotAPX plays a key role in chloroplast development by decreasing hydrogen peroxide in Populus tomentosa.

item.title: PtoUGT76C1-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potr010G195300.1 Gene Symbol: PtoUGT76C1-1 Gene Name: Genome: P.

item.title: PtoWRKY42
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.014G111900 Gene Symbol: PtoWRKY42 Gene Name: Genome: P.

item.title: PtoWRKY68
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: P.x_tomentosa21811 Gene Symbol: PtoWRKY68 Gene Name: Genome: P.

item.title: PtRD26
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.001G404100 Gene Symbol: PtRD26 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: An alternative splicing variant of PtRD26 delays leaf senescence by regulating multiple NAC transcription factors in Populus.

item.title: PtrMYB6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.001G005100.1 Gene Symbol: PtrMYB6 Gene Name: Genome: Populus trichocarpa v3.
